sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"疾病"之意。
means: illness ： 不具体指，而是泛指一切疾病，强调生病的时间或状语，语体较sickness正式一些。
sickness ： 较口语化，可与illness换用，但还可表示"恶心"。
disease ： 指具体的疾病，且通常较严重，发病时间也较长。
complaint ： 现代英语中，既可指症状，也可指疾病。

word_mean: 疾病：身体任何部分、器官和(或)系统的结构或功能的偏离正常或停止，表现为颇具特征性的症状及体征，病原、病理及预后有些已被阐明

Sentence.sentence: Before modern medicine changed the laws of nature, many children died of common childhood diseases.

Sentence.sentence: Better sewers make it less likely that heavy rain is followed by an outbreak of the disease of bad stomach.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: But the disease is making a comeback, caused by a growing anti-vaccine movement and misinformation that is spreading quickly.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: His music could stop his disease from worsening.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 选项

Sentence.sentence: It can uncover laws of nature, cure diseases, make bombs, and help bridges to stand up.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 阅读理解 阅读E 原文

Sentence.sentence: Medical research often makes use of the forests' plant and animal life, and the destruction of such species could prevent researchers from finding cures for certain diseases.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语陕西卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Simple improvements to infrastructure 基础设施can reduce the spread of disease.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: The fats in fish are thought to help prevent heart disease.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: The study showed that people who put in 300 minutes a week of exercise had a 20% lower risk of death due to heart disease.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: This trend, which was started by the medical community as a method of fighting heart disease, has had some unintended side effects such as overweight and heart disease--the very thing the medical community was trying to fight.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷1 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: To make matters worse, Moth was diagnosed with a serious disease.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Two of the authors of the review also made a study published in 2014 which/that showed a mere five to 10 minutes a day of running reduced the risk of heart disease and early deaths from all causes.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷I 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Welch examined a sick boy, Billy, and knew he had diphtheria, a deadly infectious disease mainly affecting children.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语北京卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: While I was exploring my curiosity, my disease got worse.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

sentences.en: Disease is usually caused by germs.

sentences.en: Arthritis is a chronic disease.
sentences.cn: 关节炎是一种慢性病。

sentences.en: Prejudice is a social disease.
sentences.cn: 偏见是一种社会弊病。

sentence.cn: 研究表明，每周锻炼300分钟的人死于心脏病的风险降低了20%。

sentence.from: 2019年高考英语浙江卷 听力 原文

expand_knowledge_list.cn: 不健全的；患病的；病态的

entry.def: A disease is an illness which affects people, animals, or plants, for example one which is caused by bacteria or infection.

example.ex: ...the rapid spread of disease in the area.
example.tran: 疾病在这一区域的迅速蔓延
诸如心脏病之类的疾病

entry.def: You can refer to a bad attitude or habit, usually one that a group of people have, as a disease.
entry.tran: （尤指社会某一群体的）弊病，积习，恶习

example.ex: ...the wretched disease of racism eating away at the core of our society.
example.tran: 侵蚀着我们社会核心的种族主义恶疾

means.word_mean: 1. an impairment of health or a condition of abnormal functioning

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'lack of ease; inconvenience'): from Old French desaise 'lack of ease', from des- (expressing reversal) + aise 'ease'

sentences.cn: 心脏病、肝病、肾病等
sentences.en: heart/liver/kidney, etc. disease

sentences.cn: 传染病；接触性传染病
sentences.en: an infectious/contagious disease (= one that can be passed to sb very easily)

sentences.cn: 这种病的起因不明。
sentences.en: It is not known what causes the disease.

sentences.cn: 性传播疾病的预防
sentences.en: protection against sexually transmitted diseases

sentences.cn: 他患有一种罕见的血液病。
sentences.en: He suffers from a rare blood disease.

sentences.cn: 贪婪是现代社会的恶疾。
sentences.en: Greed is a disease of modern society.

sentences.cn: 侵蚀着我们社会核心的种族主义恶疾
sentences.en: ...the wretched disease of racism eating away at the core of our society.

sentences.cn: 诸如心脏病之类的疾病

sentences.cn: 疾病在这一区域的迅速蔓延
sentences.en: ...the rapid spread of disease in the area.

sentences.cn: 这个表演者躺在马的头尾之间就象在家里那样悠然自得.
sentences.en: The performer seemed quite at home anywhere between a horse's head and its tail.

sentences.cn: 医生正在尽力消灭这种疾病.
sentences.en: The doctors are trying to stamp out the disease.

sentences.cn: 要大张旗鼓地开展爱国卫生运动, 减少疾病,提高健康水平.
sentences.en: We must carry on the patriotic public health campaign with a great fanfare, reduce disease and improve health conditions.

sentences.cn: 他病死了.
sentences.en: He is dead of a disease.

sentences.cn: 新来的人对这一疾病在当地的几种类型缺乏免疫力.
sentences.en: The newcomers lacked immunity against local strains of the disease.

sentences.cn: 医生诊断我的病为罕见的皮肤病.
sentences.en: The doctor diagnosed my illness as a rare skin disease.

sentences.cn: 这种疾病的典型症状是发高烧和胸痛.
sentences.en: The disease typically manifests itself in a high fever and chest pains.

sentences.cn: 战乱之后瘟疫接踵而来.
sentences.en: After the scourge of war came the scourge of disease.

sentences.cn: 肮脏与疾病对儿童健康成长不利.
sentences.en: Dirt and disease are adverse to the best growth of children.

sentences.cn: 我们一定要继续同贫穷和疾病作斗争.
sentences.en: We must continue to war against poverty and disease.

sentences.cn: 贫穷和疾病时常相伴而来.
sentences.en: Poverty and disease often go together.

sentences.cn: 偏见是一种社会弊病.
sentences.en: Prejudice is a social disease.

sentences.cn: 这病不 传染.
sentences.en: This disease is not contagious [ infectious ] .

sentences.cn: 这种疾病已在全世界得到根除.
sentences.en: The disease has been eradicated from the world.

sentences.cn: 营养不良降低了他们抵抗疾病的能力.
sentences.en: Lack of proper nourishment reduces their power to resist disease.

sentences.cn: 病情迅速好转.
sentences.en: The disease makes rapid progress.

sentences.cn: 缺少维生素D的饮食可能导致软骨病.
sentences.en: A diet deficient in vitamin D may cause the disease rickets.

sentences.cn: 预防疾病传播的保健措施
sentences.en: health measures to prevent the spread of disease

sentences.cn: 性传播疾病的预防
sentences.en: protection against sexually transmitted diseases

sentences.cn: 诸如心脏病之类的疾病
sentences.en: ...illnesses such as heart disease...

sentences.cn: 疾病在这一区域的迅速蔓延
sentences.en: ...the rapid spread of disease in the area.

sentences.cn: 公司现在正在研究基因如何相互作用，探寻它们之间的关联，借此判断疾病的起因或预测药物的功效。
sentences.en: Firms are now studying how genes interact, looking for correlations that might be used to determine the causes of disease or predict a drug's efficacy.

sentences.cn: Yudell及其同事在论文中引用了囊性纤维化病的例子，这种疾病被认为是“白人”疾病，所以医生常常不能诊断出非洲裔患者患有该病
sentences.en: In the paper, he and his colleagues used the example of  cystic fibrosis, which is underdiagnosed in people of African ancestry because it is thought of as a “white”disease
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 比如说， 联合国儿童基金会估计非洲约有1100 万儿童正遭受几十年来最强烈的厄尔尼诺现象所带来的饥饿、疾病和水资源短缺。
sentences.en: For example, the United Nations Children’s Fund estimates that some 11 million children in Africa face hunger, disease, and water shortages as a result of the strongest El Nio ( 厄尔尼诺) weather phenomenon in decades.
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 但到2014，该年龄群人士因阿尔茨海默病过世的比率翻了一倍多，从3.8%增加到8.5%，使这种逐步发展的脑部疾病成为了百岁老人的第二大死因。
sentences.en: But  by 2014,  the  death  rate  from  Alzheimer’s Disease  for  this  age  group  have  more than  doubled,  increasing  from  3.8% to  8.5%,  making  the  progressive  brain disease the second leading cause of death for  centenarians
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 这一群体中因阿尔茨海默病死亡的比率增加的原因之一可能是，即使在人们战胜了如癌症等其他疾病带来的死亡风险后，仍有患该病的可能。
sentences.en: One  reason  for  the  rise in  deaths  from  Alzheimer’s  disease  in this  group  may  be  that  developing  this condition  remains  possible  even  after people  beat  the  odds  of  dying  from other  diseases  such  as  cancer
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 那些身体健康、寿命超过一百岁的老人最终败给了如阿尔茨海默病这类的疾病，这类疾病会影响人的思维和认知能力。
sentences.en: People  physically fit enough to survive over 100 years  ultimately  give  in  to  diseases  such as  Alzheimer’s,  which  affects  the  mind and  cognitive  function
sentences.from: 16年12月六级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 人们都知道有些疾病是和职业联系起来的，比如煤矿工人容易得肺病。
sentences.en: It’s commonly known that certain diseases are linked with occupations like lung disease in coal miners.
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 老鼠或鸽子可能不是照顾病人明摆着的选择，但这些动物有一些可以帮助治疗人类疾病的[26]优秀技能。
sentences.en: A rat or pigeon might not be the obvious choice to tend to someone who is sick, but these creatures have some 26 superior skills that could help the treatment of human diseases.
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第一套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: 我们每个人都会变老，这一般被认为是生命中自然的一部分。把这样的事情称为“疾病”似乎是愚蠢的。
sentences.en: Aging happens to all of us, and is generally thought of as a natural part of life. It would seem silly to call such a thing a “disease.”
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第二套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: 生物物理学家亚历克斯•扎沃龙科夫认为衰老应该被看作是一种疾病他说将衰老描述为一种 疾病会激发人们开发治疗方法。
sentences.en: Biophysicist Alex Zhavoronkov believes that aging should be considered a disease. He said that describing aging as a disease creates incentives to develop treatments.
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第二套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: “这样做让制药行业放手开始治疗衰老这种疾病，而不仅仅是治疗其种种副作用，”他说。
sentences.en: “It unties the hands of the pharmaceutical(制药的）industry so that they can begin treating the disease and not just the side effects，” he said.
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第二套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: 但如果把衰老看作是一种疾病，他说，“这会吸引资金，并改变我们的医疗方式。重要的是，认识到衰老是可以治愈的。”
sentences.en: But if aging were recognized as a disease, he said, “It would attract funding and change the way we do health care. What matters is understanding that aging is curable.”
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第二套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: 哈佛大学的睡眠 专 家 Lawrence Epstein说：“睡眠与健康的联系，以及糟糕的睡眠与疾病的联系都在越来越清楚。
sentences.en: “The link between sleep and health, and bad sleep and disease is becoming clearer and  clearer,”  says  Lawrence  Epstein, a  sleep  expert  at  Harvard  University.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 这听起来就像是一种广泛传播的疾病，但是有一种科技或许可以帮忙解决这个问题。
sentences.en: This sounds like a widespread disease but it's one that technology may now help to cure
sentences.from: 18年6月四级真题(第二套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 空闲时你喜欢干什么?
sentences.en: What do you like to do in your spare time?

sentences.cn: 其研究对象是植物虫害和疾病种类,以及相应的应用技术.

sentences.cn: 在一个战争、恐怖主义、经济危机以及广泛爆发的传染病造成的威胁和动荡越来越多的世界里，还有可能过上和平安宁的生活吗？

sentences.en: If you have already had the disease, probably you won't catch it again.

sentences.cn: 麻风病是一种无疼痛感的传染病.
sentences.en: Leprosy is an indolent infectious disease.

sentences.en: Hand , foot and mouth disease ( HFMD ) is present worldwide, in virtually all countries.

sentences.cn: 经常洗手可以阻止人类传染病菌和疾病的传播.
sentences.en: Washing your hands regularly prevents transmission of human borne viruses and diseases.

sentences.cn: 传染病患者应予以隔离.
sentences.en: People with contagious diseases should be isolated.

sentences.en: Influenza is an infectious disease.

sentences.cn: 某些传染病只通过害虫和昆虫来传播.
sentences.en: Some communicable diseases are transmitted only through the agency of vermin or insects.

sentences.cn: 那种传染病早已绝迹.
sentences.en: That kind of epidemic disease has long been stamped out.
